Tweet Text:
We're launching something big.

After 3 years of building, we're ready to share our vision with the world.

Join us on this journey.

99% of VCs in crypto provide zero value beyond capital.

They don't:
- Help with GTM
- Make introductions
- Provide strategic guidance

Real builders know this.
Everyone deserves the same opportunity to succeed in crypto. No matter where you're from or how much capital you have.
